metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2136 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in Skia in Google Chrome prior to 112.0.5615.137 allowed aremote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyperform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium securityseverity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
